knxUltimateHuePlug.title: Hue Plug/Outlet
knxUltimateHuePlug.switch_info: Link your KNX switch address to control the Hue plug on/off state.
knxUltimateHuePlug.power_state_info: Optional. Track the Hue-reported power state (on/standby) on a KNX group address.
knxUltimateHuePlug.node_pins_help: Enable Node-RED input/output pins to send custom Hue API payloads or forward events to your flow.
